Source.Name: gstreamer-vaapi
Source.Description:
A collection of GStreamer plugins to let you make use of VA API video acceleration from GStreamer applications.
Includes elements for video decoding, display, encoding and post-processing using VA API (subject to hardware limitations).

Package.Name: gstreamer-vaapi
Package.Description:
A collection of GStreamer plugins to let you make use of VA API video acceleration from GStreamer applications.
Includes elements for video decoding, display, encoding and post-processing using VA API (subject to hardware limitations).
